text: As Far As I Can See is the fourth studio album by the British rock band the Zombies, and their first since 1991. The lineup includes three of the band's original members: Rod Argent, Colin Blunstone and Chris White, with fourth original member Paul Atkinson also serving as A&R; for the record. ==Critical reception== As Far As I Can See was met with negative response from critics. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Colin Blunstone - vocals *Rod Argent - keyboards, backing and lead vocals *Keith Airey - lead guitar, backing vocals *Jim Rodford - bass, backing vocals *Steve Rodford - drums *Chris White - backing vocals *Marsha Johns - rhythm guitar ;Technical *Steve Orchard - engineer, mixing *Andrew Powell - conductor *Nick Robbins - mastering *Phil Smee - design, photography *Gavyn Wright - leader *Paul Atkinson - A&R; *Chris Cook, Keith Curtis - photography ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:The Zombies albums Category:Albums produced by Rod Argent Category:Rhino Records albums
title: As Far as I Can See...
